pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:0.5: 32. The training rule on lying down on the same sheet
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.2: there were two nuns who were lying down on the same sheet and under the same cover.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.3: When people who were walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.4: “How can two nuns lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover? They are just like householders who indulge in sensual pleasures.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.5: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.6: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.7: “How can two nuns lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.11: “… How can two nuns lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.13: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:1.14: ‘If two nuns lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover, they commit an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.1.4: fully ordained is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.1.5: If two […] lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.1.6: if they spread out just the one and cover themselves with just the one, they commit an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.1: If it is the same sheet and the same cover, and they perceive them as such, and they lie down, they commit an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.2: If it is the same sheet and the same cover, but they are unsure of it, and they lie down, they commit an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.3: If it is the same sheet and the same cover, but they do not perceive them as such, and they lie down, they commit an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.4: If it is the same sheet but different covers, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.5: If it is different sheets but the same cover, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.6: If it is different sheets and different covers, but they perceive them as the same, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.7: If it is different sheets and different covers, but they are unsure of it, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.2.8: If it is different sheets and different covers, and they perceive them as such, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.3.2: if they create a separation and then lie down;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.3.4: if they are the first offenders.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.3.5: The second training rule is finished.
